name: The Whale and the Kauri Tree
name_original: The Whale and the Kauri Tree
description:
TOHORA AND TANE {THE WHALE AND THE KAURI}  - An interactive storybook about protecting the land and sea of Hokianga.

Inspired by the story of The Whale and the Kauri Tree.

Thank you for your participation in helping clean up our beautiful whenua.

 Big thankyou to Retna for the coding, animations and bringing the game together Also, thankyou grace for bringing the environment to life with the whales, crab, boats, the litter and a whole lot more. Thanks Wairua for the art, pictures sound and background theme that have come into play. Thanks Horo for your help with names, sound effects and script

Controls:

Use Mouse to move and interact.

You can also use WASD to move.
